original_text: And as for my flock, they eat that which ye have trodden with your feet; and they drink that which ye have fouled with your feet.
korean_text: 나의 양은 너희 발로 밟은 것을 먹으며 너희 발로 더럽힌 것을 마시는도다 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: they eat that which ye have trodden with your feet
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너희 발로 밟은 것을 먹으며

sentences.original_text: and they drink that which ye have fouled with your feet
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희 발로 더럽힌 것을 마신다
